com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.wrappers
Class StatusWrapper

java.lang.Object
  com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.wrappers.WrapperBase
      com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.wrappers.StatusWrapper

public class StatusWrapper
extends WrapperBase

Scripting class to give limited access to Status information. This is exposed as 'status' in some notification scripts.

Examples:

To check if the status applied to the build life is a 'Success' status: 

    status.isSuccess()
To check if the status applied to the build life is a 'Failure' status: 
    status.isFailure()
To check if the status applied to the build life is an 'Archived' status: 
    status.isArchived()
To check if the status applied to the build life is a custom status of 'Foo': 
    status.is('Foo')
